document_data.name: Zalaren
document_data.mainbody: '''Zalaren''' was a priest of [[Waukeen]] and an agent of the [[Lords' Alliance]] in [[1489 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Zalaren was a dour individual. His main concern was economic stagnation.
document_data.History: In 1489 DR, he was the Alliance delegate sent to help a hired adventuring party to defeat the great dragon [[Claugiyliamatar]] of [[Kryptgarden Forest]]. The Alliance's main objectives were to destroy siege weapons and to recover stolen cargo.{{Cite adventurers league/Corruption in Kryptgarden|9}}
